name: Celestial Shootout
description:
LMB: Accelerate towards mouse (costs 0.1% fuel)
RMB: Shoot
Q & E: Switch Weapons (there are two weapons)
Space: Repair (costs 10% fuel)
W, A, S, & D: Dash (costs 5% fuel)

Survive as long as possible.

Note: This game is a prototype build. It is made to test an idea and thus may be very bare bones.
